author: SlRDancealot

text: I hadn't played this type of game since Diablo 2 many years ago (I played that game way too much). I really enjoyed it but it felt like a prototype for the much bigger game Torchlight 2 will be, thanks to the first game's success. Music by Matt Uelmen was half of the experience for me, it really felt like I was playing a Diablo game and I was feeling nostalgia while playing it for the first time. I'll miss his music in Diablo 3, but Torchlight 2 also promises to be awesome.
author: SupraDarky
